ygData.subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... only ... Actually, you can see invised membets of your party whether they are invised under their own spell or yours. :)  But, your point stands that you
ygData.messageBody:
> I keep hearing this and hopefully this will make you all realize that the
> see invis song is still useful. Clouding only gives party see invis. In
> other words, the only invis you can see are the members of your party that
> you have invissed. You do not see all invisible creatures and players,
only
> those in your party.

Actually, you can see invised membets of your party whether they are invised
under their own spell or yours. :) But, your point stands that you can't
see anyone else outside your party who is invised.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
